text:
Light up an


LED for the first


time
title: Light up an LED for the first time
description: This is the example description for this skill.
tasks: Task 1: This is the first task.
Task 2: This is the second task.
resources: Resource 1: This is the first resource
Resource 2: This is the second resource

text:
Learn to


use wire strippers
title: Learn to use wire strippers
description: Learn how to properly use wire strippers for different gauges of wire.
tasks: Task 1: Practice stripping different wire gauges.
Task 2: Identify and handle different types of wire.
resources: Resource 1: Video tutorial on wire stripping.
Resource 2: Guide on selecting the correct wire stripper.

text:
Complete


an electronics kit
title: Complete an electronics kit
description: Assemble a full electronics kit, from start to finish.
tasks: Task 1: Follow the instructions to assemble the kit.
Task 2: Test the functionality of the finished project.
resources: Resource 1: Assembly manual for the electronics kit.
Resource 2: Video guide for assembling the kit.

text: Learn to Solder
title: Learn to Solder
description: Learn the basics of soldering components onto a PCB.
tasks: Task 1: Practice soldering simple components.
Task 2: Solder a complete circuit board.
resources: Resource 1: Soldering tutorial video.
Resource 2: List of best soldering tools.

text:
Learn to use


a breadboard
title: Learn to use a breadboard
description: Learn how to set up and use a breadboard for prototyping circuits.
tasks: Task 1: Assemble a basic circuit on a breadboard.
Task 2: Learn how to use jump wires to connect components.
resources: Resource 1: Breadboard setup guide.
Resource 2: Video tutorial on breadboard assembly.

text:
Get a circuit


wrong and try


again
title: Get a circuit wrong and try again
description: Learn how to troubleshoot and fix mistakes in your circuits.
tasks: Task 1: Identify and fix common circuit errors.
Task 2: Learn the process of circuit debugging.
resources: Resource 1: Guide on common circuit mistakes.
Resource 2: Video on troubleshooting electronics.

text:
Learn Ohm’s


Law
title: Learn Ohm’s Law
description: Understand and apply Ohm's Law in various circuits.
tasks: Task 1: Solve Ohm's law equations.
Task 2: Apply Ohm's law in real-life circuits.
resources: Resource 1: Interactive Ohm's law calculator.
Resource 2: Video explanation of Ohm's law.

text:
Fix something


something


that’s broken
title: Fix something that's broken
description: Learn how to repair common household electronics.
tasks: Task 1: Identify common problems in electronics.
Task 2: Follow a step-by-step guide to fix the device.
resources: Resource 1: Guide on electronics repair basics.
Resource 2: Video tutorial on repairing common electronics.

text:
Measure


voltage with


a multimeter
title: Measure voltage with a multimeter
description: Learn how to measure voltage in various parts of a circuit using a multimeter.
tasks: Task 1: Measure voltage across different components.
Task 2: Interpret multimeter readings.
resources: Resource 1: Multimeter user guide.
Resource 2: Video tutorial on using a multimeter.

text:
Learn to


read a schematic
title: Learn to read a schematic
description: Learn the fundamentals of reading and understanding circuit schematics.
tasks: Task 1: Identify different components in a schematic.
Task 2: Follow the schematic to build a circuit.
resources: Resource 1: Guide on reading circuit schematics.
Resource 2: Interactive schematic viewer.
